name: Monster Express
description: Monster Express is a short, point-and-click RPG-style puzzle adventure game. Olive is the paladin in a famous adventuring party, but when they find themselves on a train for monsters, they are split up. She must work with those she is used to slaying in order to start finding her friends. First on the list? Percy the mage, who has had one too many run ins with the Batties... Will she find him in time?
